yShapedOwner.description: Deep expertise in multiple verticals - HubSpot technology, business strategy, personal development coaching, and content creation

verticals.name: HubSpot Technology Expert
verticals.evidence: 42+ HubSpot certifications, HubSpot Certified Trainer, record-breaking certification holder

verticals.name: Business Growth Strategist
verticals.evidence: Founder/CEO of Sidekick Strategies, HubSpot Partner Agency, helping businesses streamline and grow

verticals.name: Personal Development Coach
verticals.evidence: Creator of Superhuman Framework, Beyond Your Default podcast, coaching leaders and solopreneurs

verticals.name: Content Creator & Speaker
verticals.evidence: HubHeroes Podcast host, INBOUND speaker every year since 2015, keynote speaker

transitionSpecialist.description: Helping businesses and individuals navigate change and transformation
evidence: Helped businesses break through barriers and achieve transformations
Transformed from solopreneur to agency owner (Sidekick Strategies)
Guides teams through HubSpot implementations and process changes
Personal story of transformation: high school dropout to industry expert
Career transitions through Wild Boy, The Sales Lion, IMPACT, Impulse Creative, to founding Sidekick Strategies

principles.name: Human-First
principles.description: The human side of business comes first - designing systems around how people actually work
quotes: At Sidekick Strategies, they believe the human side of business comes first
Humans don't buy from brands. They buy from other Humans
Without authenticity, empathy, and purpose, you're leaving relationships and revenue on the table

principles.name: Value-First
principles.description: Leading with genuine helpfulness and service before asking for anything in return
quotes: Content that is built with a laser focus on being genuinely helpful, genuinely of service
Marketing shouldn't feel like a guessing game

principles.name: Content-Driven
principles.description: Using educational content as the primary vehicle for building trust and relationships
evidence: HubHeroes Podcast - weekly HubSpot and marketing insights
Beyond Your Default Podcast - personal development

principles.name: Expert in Helping Humans
principles.description: Core identity built around being genuinely helpful to people

superhumanFramework.description: A personal and professional development framework designed to help people break free from default living and step into purpose-driven growth

fourCornerstones.name: Love
fourCornerstones.description: Deep connection with yourself, others, and your work - the energy that fuels relationships

fourCornerstones.name: Purpose
fourCornerstones.description: Not just about what you do, but why you do it - the driving force behind meaningful action

fourCornerstones.name: Passion
fourCornerstones.description: Your emotional engine that makes the grind worth it - when passionate, discipline becomes effortless

fourCornerstones.name: Persistence
fourCornerstones.description: Sustained effort paired with health - 'healthy hustle' that avoids burnout

superhumanFramework.tenHPillars: Ten additional pillars that support the framework (details to be documented)
superhumanFramework.purpose: A dashboard for life - tools to check in on 10 areas regularly to identify where you're thriving and where extra focus is needed

sidekickStrategies.name: Sidekick Strategies

culture.feam: The FEAM - a blended term uniting 'family' and 'team' into one
culture.familyFirst: Family comes before team - business built around George's family talents

sidekickStrategies.philosophy: Cut the clutter, simplify the systems, and design HubSpot around the way teams actually work

podcasts.description: Weekly podcast covering HubSpot and inbound marketing strategies

podcasts.name: Beyond Your Default
podcasts.description: Personal development podcast about living beyond default settings
podcasts.focus: Conversations about living beyond what we're told to accept, reaching for something bigger

inbound2025.description: Unveiling the SuperHuman Marketing Framework - a blueprint for marketing that feels good, builds trust, and converts

timeline.notes: While working at Pizza Hut and studying to become ordained

timeline.achievement: HubSpot Rookie Partner of the Year 2013
timeline.notes: Started with evening development and design work, then moved to full-time
Worked with Marcus Sheridan, started the Hubcast podcast
When The Sales Lion merged with IMPACT

achievements: Worked with Remington and Rachel Begg

timeline.notes: Family-driven agency built around George's family

originStory.challenge: At 17, a math teacher told him 'You'll never amount to anything'
originStory.response: Dropped out of school six weeks later and joined the Navy
originStory.transformation: From high school dropout to industry expert with 42+ certifications
originStory.lesson: Born to help people - learned this through triumphs, failures, and divine intervention
